snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail. I mourn the death of a beautiful kind friend Gail Maidman and send loving sympathy to Richard and the children. Fran Kupferman 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail. I mourn the death of a beautiful kind friend Gail Maidman and send loving sympathy to Richard and the children. Fran Kupferman 1/3
